Package ssd3

Class Summary
Calculator The calculator adds addition, subtraction, multiplication and division calculation to a UserInteraction class which defines the user interface display and keypad.
calculatorApplet This is how the GUI Calculator can be used as a java applet
Main This is how the GUI Calculator can be used as Java Application
MemoryCalculator Is a Calculator class with the additional fields and methods, specifically memory that can be stored, recalled or cleared using the SM, RM and MC buttons.
